title: China’s Eastroc Beverage Seeks Up to $1.3 Billion From Hong Kong Listing
description: Chinese energy-drink maker Eastroc Beverage Group Co. has started taking investor orders for its second listing in Hong Kong that may fetch as much as HK$10.1 billion ($1.3 billion), fueling what has been among the busiest starts to the year for the city’s share sales.
content: Chinese energy-drink maker Eastroc Beverage Group Co. has started taking investor orders for its second listing in Hong Kong that may fetch as much as HK$10.1 billion ($1.3 billion), fueling what has been among the busiest starts to the year for the city’s share sales.
